price: Sε yεboa nnipa ano (wͻ Wusͻreε da no a wͻn anyane no) bεyε wͻn atamfo; na wͻbεpo som a wͻsom wͻn no.
arabic: وَإِذَا حُشِرَ ٱلنَّاسُ كَانُواْ لَهُمۡ أَعۡدَآءٗ وَكَانُواْ بِعِبَادَتِهِمۡ كَٰفِرِينَ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: wa-idhā ḥushira al-nāsu kānū lahum aʿdāan wakānū biʿibādatihim kāfirīna
